content.title: Made in Jersey Camelot (TV Episode 2012)
content.stars: Janet Montgomery, Kristoffer Polaha, Megalyn Echikunwoke
content.description: Martina partners with Nolan Adams, a third-year lawyer, on a case about surrogate mother who sues for the baby's custody when her sister, the mother of the child, goes in a coma. Martina questions the father's motive in wanting the baby.
